component.name: nijiexpose (Dev Test)
component.summary: Tool to create and edit nijilive puppets

description.p: This is a development test version of the software maintained by Grillo del Mal, use at your own risk.
nijilive is a framework for realtime 2D puppet animation which can be used for VTubing, game development and digital animation.
nijiexpose is a tool that lets you use your nijilive models for live streaming.
This is a development test build of nijiexpose!
nijiexpose may crash unexpectedly and you will likely encounter bugs.
Make sure to save and back up your work often!
